L2_gloss: A suffix used to form the plurals of animate words.,

A suffix used to form the plurals of inanimate words.
síipuw (“river”) → siipúwal (“rivers”)
máxkeew (“it is red”) → maxkéewal (“they are red”)

not yet (+negative)
éeskwaa nŭmiitsíiwi.I didn't eat yet.
to be a road or path going in a certain direction,
In a certain manner; in a certain way;
better condition, improved condition, better state
after a while, in a while

there
Téet náh apúw. ― Maybe he is there.

close by
Awéen há ná náhnalii éenda-lalóhkeet?who is that close by working?
singular third-person pronoun: he, she, it
First person plural exclusive, we (we, but not you)
behind, from behind, in back of, Wtéeng nóom.I came
